title: Kidorable Boys' Little Space Hero Gloves
features: Kidorable Blue Space Hero Soft Acrylic Gloves for Boys With Fun Aliens and Rockets, Blue, Medium (ages 6-8), Adorable Children's Knit Gloves, Machine Washable, Fun and Practical

What will you be? A ladybug? A fireman? A dinosaur? A child with a Kidorable knit hat, scarf, mittens or gloves is carried on the wings of imagination. Our kid's winter knit sets are made from machine washable, soft acrylic so little ones stay warm & cozy.

The Kidorable collection of knit hats, mittens, & scarves has everything your little fairy, fireman, or space hero needs for imaginative play. Playful character designs add extra fun this to this knit set for kids. For toddlers, little kids & big kids.

Brighten up the cold winter weather & bring a smile to your kid's face with a knit Kidorable hat, mitten & scarf set. Made from machine washable, lightweight, soft acrylic this warm knit set keeps kiddos warm while they explore the outdoors in any weather.

Premium Quality: Kidorable character knitwear are bright, comfortable knit hats, gloves & scarves perfect for boys or girls. With their colorful, imaginative designs, Kidorable knits will keep your boy or girl warm and cozy no matter the weather!
description: Kidorable Blue Space Hero Acrylic Knit Gloves are available in sizes Small (ages 3-5), Medium (ages 6-8), and Large (ages 9 and up). Like all Kidorable knitwear they are packed with fun details. To complete the outfit, get a matching Kidorable Space Hero umbrella, boots, raincoat, knit hat and scarf and more!
Most Kidorable products are designed for children aged 2-6. Many of our products are available for babies, and children as old as 11.
Kidorable delights both children and the adults who love them by transforming everyday, functional kids' accessories into objects that excite their imaginations and enrich their lives at play.

Find the gear your kids will actually beg to wear. Raincoats, Rain Boots, Umbrellas, Backpacks, Hooded Towels, Hanger Sets, Knit Gloves, Hats, and Scarves, and more. Here you’ll find styles to spark any kid’s imagination—Shark, Dinosaur, Lucky Cat, Ladybug, Butterfly, Frog, and Lotus for animal and nature lovers. Pirate, Fairy, Mermaid, Ballerina, Fireman, Space Hero, Dragon Knight and Fireman for kids who dream big. Plus Dora the Explorer and SpongeBob SquarePants for kids who want to be their favorite characters.
We believe in the power of imagination to make everyday families happier. Because a lot is at stake.

More and more, children are forgetting how to create, to think, to explore, to connect. Over-scheduled, under-engaged, dulled by TV and video games, our kids are less and less able to amuse themselves, solve their own problems, or tell the difference between the character in the movie and the one trying to sell them cereal on TV.

It's time someone said there's a better way. Someone like us. Someone like you. It's time that children and the adults who love them rely more on human beings for connection and guidance and entertainment instead of screens with shiny lights and buttons.
It's easy. All it takes is someone who cares. And a little imagination. Won't you join us?
